sentence: The five non-voting senators were two Republicans — James Inhofe of Oklahoma and Richard Burr of North Carolina — and three Democrats — Alex Padilla and Dianne Feinstein of California and Mark Kelly of Arizona.
author: Kerry Picket
title: Senate passes resolution to end federal COVID state of emergency

sentence: Michael Bennet, Catherine Cortez Masto, Maggie Hassan, Mark Kelly, Joe Manchin, Jacky Rosen, Kyrsten Sinema, and Jon Tester.
author: DML News App
title: REPORT: White House threatens veto of Rand Paul legislation which just passed in Senate with bipartisan support

sentence: Catherine Cortez-Masto (D-NV); Michael Bennet (D-CO); Mark Kelly (D-AZ); Maggie Hassan (D-NH); Joe Manchin (D-WV); Kyrsten Sinema (D-AZ); Jon Tester (D-MT) and Jacky Rosen (D-NV).
author: Kipp Jones
title: Multiple Democratic Lawmakers Pivot on Mandates Before Midterms: ‘I’m Completely Over Mask Mandates’
